players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafia, because he discovered me."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he knows I'm not him. Diana was killed, so the mafia is active. Bob must be the mafia."
You: "I think Bob is mafia because Charlie's claim is too bold."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafia because she didn't speak. Charlie's claim is too bold."
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Diana. I investigated you and found you mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia, because he discovered me."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he knows I'm not him. Diana was killed, so the mafia is active. Bob must be the mafia."
Alice: "I think Bob is mafia because Charlie's claim is too bold."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "I think Alice is the mafia because she didn't speak. Charlie's claim is too bold."
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Diana. I investigated you and found you mafia. Vote Bob."
